post_message: Incarcerated hip-hop artist Bobby Shmurda has endorsed Hillary Clinton’s 2016 presidential bid. The 21-year-old leader of the Brooklyn-based GS9 crew is the latest in a string of high-profile hip-hop artists to back the Democratic front-runner, including Snoop Dogg, Pharell and Eminem.
